text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Back in spring, when I'd just been<n>accepted to Tracen
Academy... I<n>remember my mother poring over the<n>school
pamphlet with a big grin.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
"This academy really puts a lot of<n>effort into student life.
Look, they've<n>even got events in the dorms for<n>
Halloween and the winter holidays!"

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
"You're sure to make all sorts of<n>friends. Oh, Rob Roy,
you're going to<n>have so much fun at school!"

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(The first step to making friends is<n>making good first
impressions. I've<n>practiced a bunch of ice breakers—I<n>can
do this!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ohhh... Why am I like this?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Wait, that's right! I've got aroommate now. If anyone, I haveto make friends with her!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Uh, um...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I'm, uh...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(Hold on. She'd probably think I'm<n>weird if I suddenly
asked her to be<n>friends out of nowhere.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Begging like that would just beadmitting that I don't have anyfriends... And then she'ddefinitely steer clear of me...)
Squeeze.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Oh, sorry! My mother used to hold my<n>hand like that when I
was nervous,<n>and it always made me feel better...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry though! I hope you<n>didn't mind it too much...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: N-not at all! I, um, I actually—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I was hoping we could be friends!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(Rice always jumps right into action<n>when someone else
needs help.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (She's been itching to say something<n>to Bourbon.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (It's written all over her face, but Ihaven't done anything to help—and Idon't know what I possiblycould do.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(After all, it'd only make things weird<n>if I tried to facilitate a
discussion.<n>Maybe someone else could, though.<n>Someone
more conversational than<n>me...)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But deep down... I just...)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Oh. "Get your ghoul on"... "Dress up<n>and unleash your inner
devil"...<n>"Explore your fantasies"...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: "Dead men do tell tales in thispark-wide costume party. Alimited-time dream worldawaits—Halloween Land!"

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: This is it! If I invite everyone, then...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Several flaws detected in current<n>Halloween party plans.
Update needed<n>to execute mission successfully.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Projections show risk of error in next<n>week's schedule.
Primary<n>concern—processing prop orders—has<n>already
been completed. Attempting to<n>identify other sources of
error...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Last night, I was going to talk to<n>Bourbon. But then I saw
Tamamo and<n>Creek...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
They didn't need me. I would've just<n>been in everyone's
way... I got so<n>scared, thinking awful things, and the<n>next
thing I knew—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(I should stay out of their business.<n>Worrying and fussing
isn't going to<n>accomplish anything.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I always go making things worse, so<n>this time, I'll—)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: H-hey you two! I order you... to be my<n>familiars!

text_block_list.name: Rice & Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Huh? What?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I-I'm talking to you two!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: To... us? Even me?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I've got a task for you both! I<n>require familiars to
escort me to the<n>theme park!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
They're holding a Halloween event,<n>but it wouldn't be as
fun alone. Every<n>good witch knows that three heads<n>are
better than one.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
And it'll be suuuuuper fun, or so I've<n>heard! Inari said she
used it as<n>inspiration for planning last year's<n>party.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: A-anyway, it'll be a blast, and I really<n>wanna go! So, um...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to turn you into my<n>familiars with magic and make
you go<n>with me! I-if you don't mind!

text_block_list.name: Ritto Student
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo, what should I dooo?! I was<n>trying to mend this
shirt, but look what<n>I did...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, don't sweat it! I'll fix it up later,<n>so leave it there for me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
All that's left is to check the<n>costumes for Miho Dorm,
right? We<n>should start rounding up the students<n>who
haven't been fitted.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, and while we're at it, I'll check<n>up on how Bourbon's
gettin' along.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I heard Bourbon's going to that<n>crazy scary theme
park! She's been<n>struggling with party ideas, so I guess<n>
she's going for inspo.

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text: What, by herself? She's not taking onthat place alone, is she? ...But I doubtshe'd let us tag along. Sigh. Iwish she'd rely on us more.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Here we go again... Yeesh. Creek,<n>would you mind comin'
with?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, not at all! I'll go get ready. ♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Wow, look at all the cute little<n>pumpkins! And the dancers'<n>
costumes are so floofy!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, while I agree, that's not what<n>we're here for. Or, um...
Move it, you<n>two! We've got places to be!

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Gruoooorgh... Aauuuuurgh...

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Noise
text_block_list.text: Rustle... Rustle... Creak.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: W-well, looks like this is... the place...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Crack! Rumble...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Everyone! Hold on to your tails!<n>Hurry—before they get
taken!

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Graaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Rice & Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: AAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice! Rob Roy!

With an echoing shriek, Rice Shower<n>and Zenno Rob Roy
bolt, deaf to<n>Bourbon's attempt to stop them.<n>However,
only a zombie-infested<n>horrorscape lies ahead...
What nightmares await the three<n>here—none can know.
